mapper.select: SELECT client_id AS clientId, investment_purpose AS investmentPurpose, risk_tolerance AS riskTolerance, income_category AS incomeCategory, length_of_investment AS lengthOfInvestment FROM sc_client_preference WHERE client_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sc_client_preference ( client_id, investment_purpose, risk_tolerance, income_category, length_of_investment ) VALUES ( #{clientId}, #{investmentPurpose}, #{riskTolerance}, #{incomeCategory}, #{lengthOfInvestment} )
